full_summary:
================(rédaction de nouvelle encadré)
================

Title
--------

* **title-en:** TAM air calorimeters for cement and concrete samples
* **title-fr:** Calorimètres à air TAM pour les échantillons de ciment et de béton

Call for Tenders
----------------

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) invites qualified suppliers to bid on a contract for the provision of two TAM air multi-cell calorimeters.

Tender Details
------------

* **Contract Number:** cb-8813-92438477
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** 23-58094
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-22T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-09-29
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-29

Contract Description
-------------------

The NRC requires the provision of two TAM air multi-cell calorimeters for studies on the hydration and curing of cement, cementitious materials, mortars, and concrete. The requested equipment is essential for determining the hydration heat of Portland cement and the effect of various additives and supplementary cementitious materials (SCMs) on the hydration and curing of cements.

The unique features of the TAM air calorimeters make them the first choice for Canadian universities and research centres interested in research on cement and concrete. Specifically, they offer:

* High accuracy of test results
* Versatility in sample holder size (20 to 125 ml)
* Ease of use

Trade Agreement:
-----------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

Instructions to Suppliers
------------------------

Qualified suppliers are invited to submit a bid in response to the tender notice. The bid must include all necessary information and documentation as outlined in the contract documents.

Contact Information
----------------

For any questions or clarification on the tender, please contact
